attributes.action: Broaden His Current Innovative Leadership and Decision Making Preserves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
FAO: His Excellency Rt. Hon. Gordon Brown, British Prime Minister

I am very happy that the Prime Minister had assumed productive approaches as regards how he handles problems of the country.

It has become more apparent more than ever before that just as the current economic downturns took world leaders and everybody by surprise; the fact also remains that human nature has also assumed some dynamics more than ever before.

The appointment of Mr Peter Mandelson as his new Business Secretary is a clear demonstration of excellent leadership. I am not the least inclined to think let alone consider some of the on-going rumours and assetions that Rt. Hon. Gordon was in enmity with Mr Peter Mandelson.

The future is bright, the opportunities are there; we just need to worke harder than before and also realise that innovation constitutes the key to sustainable economic development and social stability as regards securing and consolidating the great future of this Great Country.

Many thanks for the opportunity.

Yours faithfully

Schwarzkorf Hakeem Kwame Nkrumah

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
